pl.polsl.lab.server.communication

Class ServerCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab.server.communication.ServerCommunication

  • public class ServerCommunication
extends java.lang.Object
    Communicates with the client (sends and receives data)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerCommunication(java.net.Socket socket)
      Creates input and output streams

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String receiveCommand()
      Reads a message sent by the client
      void sendBGTable(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> bgt)
      translates a berger table to a string and sends it to the client
      void sendConfirmDisconnectCommand()
      sends a one-line message, that the command to disconnect has been accepted and is being processed. starts with a code signifying success
      void sendConfirmDisconnectCommandForPutty()
      sends a one-line message, that the command to disconnect has been accepted and is being processed.
      void sendConfirmGenerateCommand(int teamNumber)
      sends a one-line message, that the command to generate a berger table has been accepted and is being processed. starts with a code signifying success
      void sendConfirmHelpCommand()
      sends a one-line message, that the command to send info has been accepted and is being processed. starts with a code signifying success
      void sendConfirmHelpCommandForPutty()
      sends a one-line message, that the command to send info has been accepted and is being processed.
      void sendDisconnectMsg()
      sends a message to the client, that they are being disconnected.
      void sendDisconnectMsgForPutty()
      sends a message to the client, that they are being disconnected, without protocol formatting.
      void sendErrorMsgWrongNumber()
      sends a message to the client, that the given number was out of the range.
      void sendErrorMsgWrongProtocol()
      sends a message to the client, that a wrong protocol was used.
      void sendHelpMsg()
      sends instructions to the client.
      void sendHelpMsgForPutty()
      sends instructions to the client without protocol formatting.
      void sendWelcomeMsg()
      sends a welcoming message to the client.
      void sendWrongParamMsg()
      sends a message to the client, that the given parameter was wrong (not a number or 'help' or 'quit'.

      • receiveCommand

        public java.lang.String receiveCommand()
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       MyException
        Reads a message sent by the client
        Returns:
        a command sent by the client (quit / help / a number)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the stream could not have been read
        MyException - if the protocol used was incorrect (no 'start' in the beginning or 'end' at the end or not using the '::' separators)

      • sendBGTable

        public void sendBGTable(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> bgt)
        translates a berger table to a string and sends it to the client
        Parameters:
        bgt - 2d array of numbers representing a berger table

        public void sendHelpMsgForPutty()
        sends instructions to the client without protocol formatting.

        public void sendDisconnectMsgForPutty()
        sends a message to the client, that they are being disconnected, without protocol formatting.

      • sendDisconnectMsg

        public void sendDisconnectMsg()
        sends a message to the client, that they are being disconnected.

      • sendConfirmDisconnectCommand

        public void sendConfirmDisconnectCommand()
        sends a one-line message, that the command to disconnect has been accepted and is being processed. starts with a code signifying success

      • sendConfirmGenerateCommand

        public void sendConfirmGenerateCommand(int teamNumber)
        sends a one-line message, that the command to generate a berger table has been accepted and is being processed. starts with a code signifying success
        Parameters:
        teamNumber - how many teams is the generator trying to generate table for

      • sendHelpMsg

        public void sendHelpMsg()
        sends instructions to the client.

      • sendConfirmHelpCommand

        public void sendConfirmHelpCommand()
        sends a one-line message, that the command to send info has been accepted and is being processed. starts with a code signifying success

      • sendConfirmHelpCommandForPutty

        public void sendConfirmHelpCommandForPutty()
        sends a one-line message, that the command to send info has been accepted and is being processed. Starts with a code signifying success and is sent without protocol formatting.

      • sendConfirmDisconnectCommandForPutty

        public void sendConfirmDisconnectCommandForPutty()
        sends a one-line message, that the command to disconnect has been accepted and is being processed. Starts with a code signifying success and is sent without protocol formatting.
